Sentence: Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I'd find her blackened bones. Instead I found her. Daenerys. Alive and unhurt. Holding her baby dragons. Have you ever heard baby dragons singing?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It's hard to be a cynic after that.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: No it doesn't.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I killed a Dothraki blood rider in single combat.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It's no lie. His name was Qotho. He was bloodrider to Khal Drogo. Take me to Slaver's Bay, put a sword in my hand, I'll prove my worth.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your Grace, I want to say--

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: This way!

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Torgo Nudho.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: We? You're a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You've been here for how many days now? I've fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Careful now.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The second time thanks to you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.

Sentence: He's a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?

Sentence: She's too smart to like it

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It's forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: If they spot us and we're unarmed, we'll say we're traders heading for the Western Market But if they see weapons…

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: There's 100,000 of them down there We can't fight our way out We wait till dark, and then we'll find her

Sentence: Don't worry it didn't touch you

Sentence: I know what happens

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.

Sentence: Have you ever done this before?

Name: jorah mormont

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: And the climate.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: How bad is it?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I owe my life to her and you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: kneels before DAENERYS.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: stands.

Name: jorah mormont

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

Sentence: nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Thoros?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I hardly recognized you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He was my father.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You returned the favor, as I recall.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your father wanted to execute me.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: and JON glance at each other.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Me too.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: pauses, then nods at JON.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He gave it to you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: They could, they just wouldn't.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: But you did forgive, despite my failures. When I heard you'd named Tyrion your Hand, it broke my heart.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You made the right choice.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I didn't. His mouth hardly stopped moving between Volantis and Meereen. It was all I could do not to throw him in the sea.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: But the mind behind all those words-

Sentence: As have we all. He owns his and learns from them.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I am. And one other suggestion, if you'll allow me.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: We have all we need to win this war.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Please, listen to me. You're the future of our house.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You'll be safer in the crypt. These things we're fighting-

Sentence: Thank you, my lady.
